summary: Build a modern, dark/blue tech-themed cybersecurity education website for "Hackroot Organization" (cybersecurity training & resources) with key pages (Home, Courses, Articles, Resources, About, Contact, Certificate Verification), featured homepage sections (courses, founder, toolkit), and SEO metadata.

existing_features.title: Implement the site-wide navigation and routing with top-level pages: Home, Courses, Articles, Resources, About, Contact, and Certificate Verification. Ensure the site title displays as “Hackroot Organization— Cybersecurity Training & Resources” and the tagline is available on the Home page.

Build the Home page hero section with the provided headline and subheadline, and two primary CTA buttons labeled “Explore Courses” (routes to Courses) and “Read Articles” (routes to Articles). Use a dark tech grid/circuit-board style background with animated code-line accents.

Create a Featured Courses section on the Home page showcasing these programs: Ethical Hacking, Penetration Testing, Bug Bounty Hunting, Security Research, Certification Prep. Each item must include a title and short description, and the section must include a “View All Courses” button that routes to the Courses page.

Add a “Meet the Founder” section on the Home page for: Name “Almadad Ali”, Role “Cybersecurity Expert & Educator”, and the provided description. Include a circular portrait image and a short bio layout consistent with the site theme.

Add a Home page section titled “Free Ethical Hacking Toolkit” that introduces categories: Reconnaissance Tools, Scanners, Exploitation Utilities, Cryptography Tools. Include a CTA labeled “Explore Toolkit” that routes to the Resources page and display the legal note: “Tools are for educational and authorized testing only.”

Implement the Courses page as a cards/grid layout listing training modules. Each course card must show: Title, Description, Skill level (Beginner to Advanced), Duration, and an “Enroll” button. Populate the page with initial content that includes (at minimum) the five featured course topics from the Home page.

Implement the Articles page in a blog format. Each article entry must display a featured image, headline, short preview text, and a “Read More” CTA. Include initial article topics covering: cybersecurity tips, hacking fundamentals, and security research trends.

Implement the Resources page highlighting: Toolkits, Cheat sheets, Security utilities, and External learning resources. Use icons/graphics to visually differentiate each category and provide clear structure for learners.

Implement the About page with mission statement and vision: “Empower learners to become cybersecurity professionals through practical training and community support.” Include sections for company story, vision & values, founder’s expertise, and an optional testimonials section (can be present with placeholder testimonials).

Implement the Contact page with an inquiry form (name, email, subject, message), display the email address “support/contact@example.com”, and include social links. Style the form with secure/tech-themed input visuals and clear validation states.

Implement the Certificate Verification page with a verification form (e.g., certificate ID/code input) that checks validity and displays a clear result state (Valid/Invalid). Provide a minimal backend data model for certificates and a backend query method to verify a certificate by its ID/code.

Add a global footer including: quick links (Home, Courses, Articles, Resources, About, Contact), social media icons (YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn, Telegram, Twitter), Terms & Conditions link, Privacy Policy link, and copyright text “Copyright © Year CyberMindspace”.

Apply a consistent, modern cybersecurity visual theme across the entire site using the specified palette (Primary #0A1A2F, Accent #1F51FF, Highlight #00FFAB, light gray/white text), tech textures/patterns (matrix/circuit), security/code visual motifs (lock/shield/terminal/code brackets/tools), and subtle hover animations for buttons and cards.

Set global SEO metadata using: SEO Title “Cybersecurity Courses & Ethical Hacking Training | CyberMindspace”, Meta Description “Join CyberMindspace for hands-on cybersecurity training, ethical hacking courses, real-world tools, and expert resources. Learn, practice, and advance your cyber skills.”, and Keywords “cybersecurity training, ethical hacking courses, penetration testing, cybersecurity resources, security toolkit”.

Add generated static image assets required by the design (hero background, founder portrait placeholder, course/article thumbnails, and simple security/tool icons) and render them from frontend static assets at `frontend/public/assets/generated`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create site IA/navigation with pages: Home, Courses, Articles, Resources, About, Contact, Certificate Verification
Homepage hero section with headline/subheadline, CTAs (Explore Courses/Read Articles), and dark tech grid/circuit background styling
Homepage featured courses section with course cards (Ethical Hacking, Pen Testing, Bug Bounty, Security Research, Cert Prep) and View All Courses CTA
Homepage 'Meet the Founder' section for Almadad Ali with circular portrait and short bio
Homepage 'Free Ethical Hacking Toolkit' section with categories, Explore Toolkit CTA, and legal note disclaimer
Courses page with grid/card layout including title, description, skill level, duration, and enroll button
Articles/blog page with featured image, headline, preview text, and Read More CTA
Resources page highlighting toolkits, cheat sheets, security utilities, and external resources with icons/graphics
About page with mission/vision, company story, values, founder expertise, and optional testimonials
Contact page with inquiry form, email (support/contact@example.com), optional phone, and social links
Certificate Verification page/feature for validating certificates
Global footer with quick links, social icons, Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, and copyright
Apply global design system: dark blue/electric blue palette, neon green highlights, security icons, modern fonts, and subtle hover animations
Add SEO metadata (SEO title, meta description, keywords)

architectural_notes: Branding/content references include "Hackroot Organization" (site title) and "CyberMindspace" (SEO title/footer); confirm the canonical brand name to use consistently.
Design theme: dark/blue gradients with tech/circuit/matrix textures and security/code-style visuals; use vector security icons and subtle hover animations.
Typography suggestion: modern sans for headings (Montserrat/Poppins) and clean sans for body (Open Sans/Roboto).
